articles.title: Niger coup leader warns regional and Western powers against military intervention - BBC
articles.description: West African leaders set a seven-day deadline for the junta to reinstate the ousted president.
articles.content:
West African leaders have threatened military action against Niger's military junta after it took power in a coup last week
The leaders gave the junta seven days to reinstate President Mohamed Bazou… [+3051 chars]
